Authors and Citation

Authors

  • Frederic Bertrand. Maintainer, author.

  • Myriam Maumy-Bertrand. Author.

  • Laurent Vallat. Contributor.

  • Nicolas Jung. Contributor.

Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

Jung, N., Bertrand, F., Bahram, S., Vallat, L., and Maumy-Bertrand, M. (2014). Cascade: a R-package to study, predict and simulate the diffusion of a signal through a temporal gene network. Bioinformatics, 30(4):571-573, btt705, https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btt705.
